works.description:
This album was first reported on 25 June 

2011.
The album, Welch's Gallery, contains, in total, 1000 scanned images of the
 
complete pages of Alan Dart's copyrighted knitting and sewn toy patterns. 

Each scan is of such quality that they can be downloaded to obtain the  
patterns, which infringes Alan's copyright, and is illegal. Furthermore,
by  
disributing the patterns in this way, his income is directly affected.  
Below is one of the album's urls and the urls of a representative 5 (of  
1000) of the patterns.
